item.title: The Garden Flower Challenge
item.description: Table Of Contents ðŸ”¥ Motivation ðŸ”© Set-Up Install libraries Import Libraries Utilities Functions Split Dataset into class Balanced sub-sets Selecting the Run-Device Adding Augmentation Creating the Pytorch DataLoader Creating the Learner and Adding CutMix Running the Learner ðŸ”¥ Motivation Link to heading This is a quite common “take home” challenge. The task is to train a quick proof of concept model verifying the feasibility of detecting flower species in images coming from this dataset.
